alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Camas Prairie; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 5:44PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Camas and northeastern Gooding Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 544 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Flat Top Butte, or 12 miles southeast of Fairfield, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Selby around 550 PM MDT. Kelly Reservoir and Blaine Bridge around 600 PM MDT. Magic Reservoir around 610 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Boise Mountains; Camas Prairie; Western Magic Valley
